content.en: Aerodynamic train optimization: Researchers have been using algorithms to optimize the aerodynamic performance of high-speed trains. They have developed various methods, such as genetic algorithms and parametric modeling, to improve the shape of train heads and reduce aerodynamic drag. These algorithms, combined with advanced modeling techniques, help engineers design trains that are more efficient and can withstand crosswind conditions.
content.da: Aerodynamisk togoptimering: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at optimere aerodynamisk ydeevne for højhastighedstog. De har udviklet forskellige metoder, såsom genetiske algoritmer og parametrisk modellering, for at forbedre formen på toghederne og reducere aerodynamisk modstand. Disse algoritmer, kombineret med avancerede modelleringsteknikker, hjælper ingeniører med at designe tog, der er mere effektive og kan modstå sidevindforhold.
